title: phished employee W2 information
extract: Form W-2 (officially, the "Wage and Tax Statement") is an Internal Revenue Service (IRS) tax form used in the United States to report wages paid to employees and the taxes withheld from them. ... An employer must mail out the Form W-2 to employees on or before January 31.
extract_html: Form W-2 (officially, the "Wage and Tax Statement") is an Internal Revenue Service (IRS) tax form used in the United States to report wages paid to employees and the taxes withheld from them. ... An employer must mail out the Form W-2 to employees on or before January 31.
